channel.title: github on Anton Sizikov
channel.description: Recent content in github on Anton Sizikov

item.title: GitHub Environment Protection with Tags
item.description: A recent request from a customer caught my attention.

item.title: Using GitHub Container Registry with Kubernetes
item.description: GitHub Container Registry was introduced on the 1st of September 2020.

item.title: Fully automated Continuous Integration for your Open Source library for free
How to convince Linus Torvalds to contribute to your project
item.description: Look at all those famous people committing to some random developer’s boring repository.

item.title: GitHub Deployment statuses
item.description: It’s very important to collect and track as much information as you can about your system.

item.title: Avoid typing user name when committing to GitHub repository
item.description: I use different accounts and different computers to work with GitHub repositories, so sometimes I face the situation when I don’t have my SSH key generated for the current environment.
